text.section: The Commissioner may delegate to the assistant commissioner for occupational safety and health any duty or function of the Commissioner under this title.

section.section: The Commissioner may enter into a written agreement with a governmental unit to delegate any power of inspection under this title.

An agreement under this subsection shall:
specify the procedure to be used in an inspection under the agreement;
enable the Commissioner to monitor an inspection power under the agreement; and
enable the Commissioner to revoke the agreement at any time.
